DOC.brief_title: Peripheral Registry Endovascular Clinical Outcomes `` The PRIME Registry ''
DOC.detailed_description: The Peripheral RegIstry Endovascular Clinical OutcoMEs ( PRIME Registry ) represent collaborative effort among three center across US goal reach 10 site globally . PRIME explore aspect advanced peripheral arterial disease ( PAD ) critical limb ischemia ( CLI ) care include collection comprehensive clinical , diagnostic , procedural , follow-up data three year follow index endovascular procedure . Data collection activity begin January 2013 goal collect data 5,000 subject . Analysis multi-site registry produce generalizable finding describe clinical epidemiology management practice advance PAD CLI patient .
